You can do a "test drive" on their site. I just did and I think it's a match.

I was looking for that test drive!

Bingo! Thank you patty.

\*Edited for idiocy\*  
There's nothing out there just like \*HFJ Didot\* in terms of contrast and those beautiful s-curves, but some cousins include Linotype Gianotten Light, Paratype Bodoni, Andrade, and for the numbers Bodoni Classic Bold Swashes by Wiescher Design.

Obviously, I had a nice tour of type looking for this one, but when I found it and refreshed, the answer was there. At least I have some more knowledge of this little corner of the world.

Horton  
Founder, [This Day in Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20150111231800/http:/www.thisdayintype.com/)
